author: pamarcelot
msg: Added a new Page to the Attribute Type Editor : the Used By Page. This page displays the OCs that uses the current AT as mandatory or optional attribute.
Fixed DIRSTUDIO-51 (Add a way to get the OC which use an AT).

author: nick
msg: If the username length in the CurrentUserAtom is clearly wrong, treat it as if there was no username, rather than giving an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
